name: Isekai Musume to Konkatsuchuu: Isekai Bride Hunting - Meir Edition
summary: “Isekai Musume Hatsujouchuu”, released in 2019 from the bishojo game brand Calcite, has been remade for the CS Novel Club platform. Meir Edition is a short version that includes a story focusing on a friendly cat-eared girl named Meir.
